reviewText: This is an amazing look into group therapy, also a valuable resource to help people understand their white privilege.

This film is a t-group type interaction of people with a range of ages, ethnicities, races, genders and sexual orientations.  It is co-facilitated with incredible skill by two group leaders.  I truly wish I could have the experience of participating in a group like this myself.  In the meantime, this film is a real eye-opener and heart-opener.
